page.title: 10Farming and Forestry
page.content: Whitwell has two main sources of employment, mining and agriculture. There are 10 farms in our grid area.The majority of the farms are arable although there is a dairy farm,and a market garden farm,that sells direct to the public. The arable farms grow wheat,potatoes,rape seed and peas. The scenery around Whitwell is predominantly cultivated,with the only barren land being that occupied by the coal slag heaps.There are two plantation areas where deciduous trees are grown by the Forestry Commision(Whitwell Wood and Bismarck Plantation)
